Amorae Bridal

Design & Development

Challenge

Amorae Bridal is an award winning bridal shop located in Essex. They needed a fully responsive website that would showcase their products, items on sale and allow customers to contact them directly. Their only project requirments were for the use of Edwardian script font, use of their brand colours and to somehow include their brides photos.

It begins on paper

The discovery stage is the most important step in the process. This is where I list out the needs, wants and requirements of the client and work out how many pages/panels are needed.

The next step of the discovery process is to wirefram numerous versions of each page until a decision has been made. The final step is to mock up a user flow to envision how the user will use the site and how each journey can differ.

Landing page wireframes

User flow and experience
